xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.1 Paṭiccavāra » 11.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Ācayagāmittika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
16.
1466Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane satta, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1467Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
